pages.text: 50|16|hananim-eun ingan-eul changjohasa ingan-ui ma-eumsog-e sogsag-igo issneun geos-eul algo iss-eumyeo ingan-ui mog-e iss neun hyeolgwanboda naega deo ingan-ege ga kkai issnola
50|17|dumyeong-i immyeongdoeeo ucheuggwa jwa cheug-e anj-a ingan-ui haeng-wileul gwanchalha go issnola
50|18|ingan-i malhal ttaemada hamkke issdeon cheonsa-e uihayeo gamsidoego gilog doemyeo
50|19|jinlie ttala jug-eum-e ileuni geugeos-i balo neohuiga pihalyeo nolyeog haessdeon geos-ila malhayeojimyeo
50|20|napal-i ullini geugeos-i balo gyeong-gobad-eun gyeong-goui nal-ila
50|21|geuttae modeun ingan-eun geuleul indohal cheonsawa jeung-eonhal cheonsaga geuwa hamkke oni
50|22|neohuiga oneul-eul mugwansimhaessnaniije uliga geu beil-eul geodueo julila geulihayeo oneul-eul bolila
50|23|geuui dongbanjaga yeogie junbi doen geuui gilog-i jeowa hamkke issnaida lago malhanola
50|24|hananim-eul geoyeoghaessdeon omanhan modeun jadeul-eul jiog-eulo deonjila
50|25|geudeul-eun seon-eul silcheonham-e banghae hago uisim-eulo joeag-eul nahneun jadeul imyeo
50|26|hananim anin daleun sindeul-eul sungbaehaessdeon jadeul-ini chamhoghan gotong sog eulo deonjila
50|27|geuui dongbanjaga juyeo jega geuleul joeag-eulo yuhoghaji anihaess-eumyeogeu seuseulo keuge banghwanghayeossnaida
50|28|hananim-i malsseumhasa nae ap-e seo seologa nonjaenghaji malla imi naega neohuiege gyeong-gohaessnola
50|29|naega naelin seongoneun byeongyeongdoeji anhnola naega nae jongdeul-ege budangha ji anh-eul geos-ila
50|30|eoneunal hananimkkeseo man-won-ingalago jiog-e mul-euni ajig deohayeo eul jaga issnaikka lago malhadeola
50|31|geuleona uiloun jadeul-egeneun chingug-i meolji ani haess-euni
50|32|igeos-eun chamhoehayeo hananimkke gwiuihago geubun-ui yulbeob-eul junsuhaneun-uiloun jadeul-ege yagsogdoen geos-imyeo
50|33|boiji anihamyeo jaaelousinhananim-eul dulyeowo hamyeo geubunkke heon sinhaneun jadeul-eul wihan geos-ini
50|34|pyeon-anhi geuligo anjeonhage geu gos-e deul-eogala igeos-i yeongsaeng-ui nal ila
50|35|geugos-eneun geudeul-i wonhaneun mo deun geos-i iss-eumyeo hananim gyeot-eneun deomanh-eun geos-i issnola
